doc.field: Series VI: American Views (includes New York State)
Subseries VIA: AMERICAN VIEWS - BOXED MATERIAL
Series VI: American Views (includes New York State)
Subseries VIA: AMERICAN VIEWS - BOXED MATERIAL
New-York Historical Society collection of geographic images
New-York Historical Society collection of geographic images

Includes: printed engraving of Elias Hicks residence at Jericho (1880s?); postcard, drawing of Old St. John's, Johnstown, NY (1910), gift of John Pierce, 1910; photo, frog pond at Jamaica, L.I. (1931), from E.B. Child collection; photo, Indian Village at Jones Beach, L.I. (1935), believed to be taken by donor's unnamed father, gift of Susan Kelso Malone, 20190; photo, covered bridge, Jay, NY (1953); photo, covered bridge over Ballenskill River, Jacksonville, NY (1955); postcard, Osceola Beach and Picnic Grove, Jefferson Valley, NY (1966); photo of drawing from N-YHS collection of Jessup's Landing (undated).
New-York Historical Society collection of geographic images
